preface.title: About This Guide
preface.para: This guide provides cloud operators with the information needed to deploy and maintain &cloud; administrative units, the &admserv; and the &contrnode;, as well as the Compute and &stornode;s. The &admserv; provides all services needed to manage and deploy all other nodes in the cloud. The &contrnode; hosts all &ostack; services needed to operate virtual machines deployed on the &compnode;s in the &cloud;. Each virtual machine (&vmguest;) started in the cloud will be hosted on one of the &compnode;s. Object storage is managed by the &stornode;s.

Many chapters in this manual contain links to additional documentation resources. These include additional documentation that is available on the system as well as documentation available on the Internet.
